This is a multi-part message in MIME format. 
 
MIME element (text/plain)
Dear Sir, or Madam, 
  
Our Content Protection Team has reported that you are hosting a website:

http://www.slashphone.com/ which contain confidential material about one
of our development prototype. 
  
The following pictures has been uploaded without our approval and must
be removed. 
  
http://www.slashphone.com/media/data/906/medium/se-w200-1.jpg
http://www.slashphone.com/media/data/906/medium/se-w200-2.jpg
http://www.slashphone.com/media/data/906/medium/se-w200-3.jpg
http://www.slashphone.com/media/data/906/medium/se-w200-4.jpg
http://www.slashphone.com/media/data/906/medium/se-w200-5.jpg

http://www.slashphone.com/media/data/906/medium/se-w200-7.jpg
http://www.slashphone.com/media/data/906/medium/se-w200-8.jpg
http://www.slashphone.com/media/data/906/medium/se-w200-9.jpg
http://www.slashphone.com/media/data/906/medium/se-w200-10.jpg
http://www.slashphone.com/media/data/906/medium/se-w200-11.jpg
http://www.slashphone.com/media/data/906/medium/se-w200-12.jpg
http://www.slashphone.com/media/data/906/medium/se-w200-13.jpg
http://www.slashphone.com/media/data/906/medium/se-w200-14.jpg
http://www.slashphone.com/media/data/906/medium/se-w200-15.jpg
http://www.slashphone.com/media/data/906/medium/se-w200-16.jpg
http://www.slashphone.com/media/data/906/medium/se-w200-17.jpg
http://www.slashphone.com/media/data/906/medium/se-w200-18.jpg
http://www.slashphone.com/media/data/906/medium/se-w200-19.jpg
http://www.slashphone.com/media/data/906/medium/se-w200-20.jpg
http://www.slashphone.com/media/data/906/medium/se-w200-21.jpg
http://www.slashphone.com/media/data/906/medium/se-w200-22.jpg
http://www.slashphone.com/media/data/906/medium/se-w200-23.jpg
http://www.slashphone.com/media/data/906/medium/se-w200-24.jpg 
  
  
We hereby formally request that you immediately remove these pictures
from the website: http://www.slashphone.com/  and confirm the same by
email. 
  
Thank you in advance for your cooperation on this matter. 
Regards, 
  
"We hereby declare that we are duly authorized to act on behalf of
Gameloft. We certify under penalty of perjury that the foregoing is true
and correct."
